# SLAY Visualization Data Log
# Generated: 2026-01-28T06:18:10.379768
#============================================================

## ANALYSIS CONTEXT

### Goal
Present the complete SLAY story: from kernel motivation to approximation quality to attention behavior.

### What to Look For
1) Panel (a): Compare kernel shapes - spherical YAT is bounded unlike softmax. 2) Panel (b): SLAY quadrature closely approximates exact kernel. 3) Panel (c): Attention patterns show more concentrated SLAY vs diffuse softmax.

### Expected Conclusion
SLAY combines the best of both worlds: the geometric selectivity of spherical YAT with the linear complexity of random features, enabling scalable yet semantically-aware attention.

#------------------------------------------------------------

## Description
Composite story figure: kernel comparison, approximation, attention patterns
